articles.author: Darreonna Davis
articles.title: European, Middle Eastern, South American Floods Kill At Least 35 People, Damage Structures—See Photos - Forbes
articles.description: Here are photos of the damage caused by flooding in Brazil, Bulgaria, Greece, Spain and Turkey.
articles.content: Over the past few days, Brazil, Bulgaria, Greece, Spain and Turkey have been inundated with torrential rainfall that has done considerable damage and turned fatal for some, as scientists warn floodin… [+1093 chars]
